text: Hi everyone! I'm a PhD student in computational/quantum chemistry from Brazil. I work on building software and models for predicting chemical reaction mechanisms, which could eventually be used to precisely design catalysis and chemical devices.

elements.text: Hi everyone! I'm a PhD student in computational/quantum chemistry from Brazil. I work on building software and models for predicting chemical reaction mechanisms, which could eventually be used to precisely design catalysis and chemical devices.

text: Onde no Brasil?  Eu morava na Bahia quando eu tinha 15 anos :slightly_smiling_face:
